__e: Sir, I told you, I don't know where he's at.
Oh. senor, free me From this miserable existence and I shall be your slave forever...
Senor, I think you have a very poor image of our country.
Thank you for coming, senor Monk.
- Bienvenidos.! This is a great honor, senor Monk.
I wish you had been here for that case, senor Monk.
